memberdef.argsstring: (NRF_MVDMA_Type *p_reg, uint32_t mask, uint8_t irq_priority, bool enable)
memberdef.name: nrfy_mvdma_int_init

briefdescription.para: Function for initializing the specified MVDMA interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be initialized.
Interrupt priority.
True if the interrupts are to be enabled, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Function for uninitializing the specified MVDMA interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

briefdescription.para: Function for processing the specified MVDMA events.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of events to be processed, created by NRFY_EVENT_TO_INT_BITMASK().
Pointer to the structure of list execution request associated with the last operation. Can be NULL.

simplesect.para: Mask of events that were generated and processed. To be checked against the result of NRFY_EVENT_TO_INT_BITMASK().

briefdescription.para: Function for starting the MVDMA jobs in single-mode.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the structure of list execution request if the transaction is to be blocking. NULL for non-blocking transactions.

briefdescription.para: Function for starting the MVDMA jobs in multi-mode.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Index of the job list that will be executed.
Pointer to the structure of lists execution request if the transaction is to be blocking. NULL for non-blocking transactions.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting the MVDMA job lists in multi-mode.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the structure of list execution request.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the MVDMA job lists in multi-mode.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the structure to be filled with list execution request.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting the MVDMA jobs.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the structure of list execution request.

briefdescription.para: Function for resetting the MVDMA peripheral.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
True if reset is to be done in blocking mode, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Function for aborting the MVDMA transaction.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the structure of list execution request.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the MVDMA source job details.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the structure to be filled with job list description.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the MVDMA sink job details.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the structure to be filled with job list description.

simplesect.para: nrf_mvdma_task_trigger Function for activating the specified MVDMA task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task to be activated.

simplesect.para: nrf_mvdma_task_address_get Function for getting the address of the specified MVDMA task register.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Specified task.

simplesect.para: Address of the specified task register.
nrf_mvdma_start_task_get Function for getting START task by its index.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Index of the START task.

simplesect.para: START task.
nrf_mvdma_event_clear Function for clearing the specified MVDMA event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event to clear.

simplesect.para: nrf_mvdma_event_check Function for retrieving the state of the MVDMA event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event to be checked.
The event has been generated.
The event has not been generated.

simplesect.para: nrf_mvdma_event_address_get Function for getting the address of the specified MVDMA event register.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Specified event.

simplesect.para: Address of the specified event register.
nrf_mvdma_int_enable Function for enabling specified interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be enabled. Use nrf_mvdma_int_mask_t values for bit masking.

simplesect.para: nrf_mvdma_int_disable Function for disabling specified interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be disabled. Use nrf_mvdma_int_mask_t values for bit masking.

simplesect.para: nrf_mvdma_int_enable_check Function for checking if the specified interrupts are enabled.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be checked. Use nrf_mvdma_int_mask_t values for bit masking.

simplesect.para: Mask of enabled interrupts.
nrf_mvdma_int_pending_get Function for retrieving the state of pending interrupts.
States of pending interrupt are saved as a bitmask. One set at particular position means that interrupt for event is pending.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: Bitmask with information about pending interrupts. Use nrf_mvdma_int_mask_t values for bit masking.
nrf_mvdma_subscribe_set Function for setting the subscribe configuration for a given MVDMA task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task for which to set the configuration.
Channel through which to subscribe events.

simplesect.para: nrf_mvdma_subscribe_clear Function for clearing the subscribe configuration for a given MVDMA task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task for which to clear the configuration.

simplesect.para: nrf_mvdma_publish_set Function for setting the publish configuration for a given MVDMA event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event for which to set the configuration.
Channel through which to publish the event.

simplesect.para: nrf_mvdma_publish_clear Function for clearing the publish configuration for a given MVDMA event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event for which to clear the configuration.

simplesect.para: nrf_mvdma_mode_set Function for setting the MVDMA mode.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Desired operating mode for MVDMA.

simplesect.para: nrf_mvdma_aximode_set Function for setting the AXI mode.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Desired AXI mode for MVDMA.

simplesect.para: nrf_mvdma_source_list_ptr_set Function for setting the pointer to the source descriptor list or pointer to the list of descriptor list pointers, depending on configured nrf_mvdma_mode_t mode.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to a job list.

simplesect.para: nrf_mvdma_source_list_ptr_get Function for getting the pointer to the source descriptor list or pointer to the list of descriptor list pointers, depending on configured nrf_mvdma_mode_t mode.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: Pointer to a job list.
nrf_mvdma_sink_list_ptr_set Function for getting the pointer to the sink descriptor list or pointer to the list of descriptor list pointers, depending on configured nrf_mvdma_mode_t mode.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to a job list.

simplesect.para: nrf_mvdma_sink_list_ptr_get Function for getting the pointer to the sink descriptor list or pointer to the list of descriptor list pointers, depending on configured nrf_mvdma_mode_t mode.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: Pointer to a job list.
nrf_mvdma_crc_result_get Function for getting the result of CRC checksum calculation.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: Result of CRC checksum calculation.
nrf_mvdma_fifo_status_get Function for getting the status of intermediate FIFO.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: Intermediate FIFO status.
nrf_mvdma_activity_check Function for checking the MVDMA activity.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
MVDMA is processing data.
MVDMA is idle.

simplesect.para: nrf_mvdma_source_error_get Function for getting the bus error of MVDMA data source.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: Bus error of data source.
nrf_mvdma_sink_error_get Function for getting the bus error of MVDMA data source.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: Bus error of data sink.
nrf_mvdma_last_source_address_get Function for getting the latest address being accessed on the source AXI channel.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: Latest address being accessed on the source AXI channel.
nrf_mvdma_last_sink_address_get Function for getting the latest address being accessed on the sink AXI channel.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: Latest address being accessed on the sink AXI channel.
nrf_mvdma_source_job_count_get Function for getting the number of completed jobs in the current source descriptor list.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: Number of completed jobs in the current source descriptor list.
nrf_mvdma_sink_job_count_get Function for getting the number of completed jobs in the current sink descriptor list.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: Number of completed jobs in the current sink descriptor list.
NRF_MVDMA_HAS_NEW_VER Symbol indicating whether MVDMA uses new or old version.
NRF_MVDMA_HAS_AXIMODE Symbol indicating whether AXIMODE configuration is present.

briefdescription.para: Hardware access layer with cache and barrier support for managing the MVDMA peripheral.
